summary: This document consists of email exchanges primarily involving Jeffrey Epstein and Andrew L. Farkas, discussing financial strategies and potential investments, including a sailboat purchase. It also references the operational changes at Turner Construction due to economic conditions in Dubai. The correspondence highlights Epstein's involvement in financial discussions and investment opportunities.

events.title: Turner Construction Operational Changes
events.description: Turner Construction is moving its staff from Dubai to Abu Dhabi due to a decline in contracts.
